title: Truncate Multiline Text
description: In this lab, we will learn how to truncate multiline text that exceeds the dimensions of its container. This technique is useful for displaying excerpts of longer text while maintaining a clean and organized design. By using CSS properties such as overflow, height, and background, we can create a visually pleasing truncation effect that enhances the user experience.
